backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (Availability, Booking, Laborer, Service) and implementing laborer profile management, booking creation/updates, and user profile operations with access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, profile management, discovery, booking, dashboard) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, including routing, hooks, components, pages, and styling with warm earth-tone color system.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm earth tones (amber, orange, stone) and custom design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Labor Booking App with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, profile, discovery, booking, and dashboard pages, wrapped in Layout with ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Responsive layout component with sticky header, navigation links (desktop and mobile), authentication button, and footer with LaborConnect branding and Briefcase icon.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Non-dismissible modal dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name, using useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation for submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with identity-based authentication, admin token initialization, and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend API calls including user profiles, laborer data, bookings, and location-based searches with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including sidebar, chart, and UI component styling tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsDashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying incoming and outgoing bookings with status management, filtering by user principal, and action buttons for confirming/cancelling bookings.
frontend/src/pages/BookingSuccessPage.ts: Success confirmation page displayed after booking submission with navigation options to discover more laborers or view bookings dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBookingPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new booking with a specific laborer, collecting service type, date/time, duration, and location details before submission.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Discovery page component that allows authenticated users to search for laborers by location, displaying results in cards with availability status, skills, services, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section and features overview, showing authentication-dependent CTAs and explaining how the labor booking platform works.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page where authenticated laborers can view and edit their profile information including name, skills, services, location, contact details, and availability status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors (using OKLCH), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a labor booking marketplace app with existing features for authentication, profile management, discovery, and booking, plus pending feature requests.
